# AIDK - AI Agent Development Kit

> A JSX framework for building AI agents

## Overview

AIDK is a TypeScript framework for building AI agents using familiar React patterns:
- JSX components for declarative agent definitions
- Hooks (useState, useEffect, useComputed) for state management
- Signal-based reactivity for efficient updates
- Multi-model support (OpenAI, Google, Anthropic via AI SDK)

## Documentation

- Getting Started: https://aidk.dev/docs/getting-started
- API Reference: https://aidk.dev/api
- Examples: https://aidk.dev/examples

## Source Code

- Repository: https://github.com/aidk/aidk
- AI Agent Guide: https://github.com/aidk/aidk/blob/master/CLAUDE.md

## Key Concepts

### JSX Components
Define agents as JSX components with familiar patterns:
```tsx
function MyAgent() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
  return <Assistant model="gpt-4o">You are helpful. Count: {count}</Assistant>;
}
```

### Tools
Create tools with typed parameters:
```tsx
const Calculator = createTool({
  name: 'calculate',
  input: z.object({ expression: z.string() }),
  handler: async ({ expression }) => eval(expression)
});
```

### Streaming
Stream agent responses in real-time:
```tsx
for await (const event of engine.stream(agent, input)) {
  if (event.type === 'content_delta') console.log(event.delta);
}
```

## Package Structure

| Package | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| aidk | Core framework (JSX, hooks, engine) |
| aidk-kernel | Low-level execution primitives |
| aidk-shared | Platform-independent types |
| aidk-client | Browser client |
| aidk-server | Server utilities |
| aidk-express | Express middleware |
| aidk-nestjs | NestJS module |
| aidk-react | React bindings |
| aidk-angular | Angular bindings |
| aidk-ai-sdk | Vercel AI SDK adapter |
| aidk-openai | OpenAI native adapter |
| aidk-google | Google AI native adapter |
